summary.span: 允許應用程式使用簡易郵件傳輸通訊協定 (SMTP) 傳送電子郵件。

span.span: Allows applications to send email by using the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來傳送電子郵件給 SMTP 伺服器進行傳遞。The class is used to send email to an SMTP server for delivery. SMTP 通訊協定定義於 RFC 2821，位於[ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The SMTP protocol is defined in RFC 2821, which is available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). 下表所示的類別用來建構使用傳送的電子郵件訊息。The classes shown in the following table are used to construct email messages that can be sent using . |類別Class|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||表示檔案附件。Represents file attachments. 這個類別可讓您將檔案、 資料流或文字附加至電子郵件訊息。This class allows you to attach files, streams, or text to an email message.| ||表示傳送者和收件者電子郵件地址。Represents the email address of the sender and recipients.| ||表示電子郵件訊息。Represents an email message.| 建構和傳送電子郵件訊息使用，您必須指定下列資訊：To construct and send an email message by using , you must specify the following information: - 您用來傳送電子郵件的 SMTP 主機伺服器。The SMTP host server that you use to send email. 請參閱和屬性。See the and properties. - 進行驗證，如果 SMTP 伺服器所需的認證。Credentials for authentication, if required by the SMTP server. 請參閱 屬性。See the property. - 寄件者電子郵件地址。The email address of the sender. 請參閱並採用的方法`from`參數。See the and methods that take a `from` parameter. 另請參閱屬性。Also see the property. - 電子郵件地址的收件者地址。The email address or addresses of the recipients. 請參閱並採用的方法`recipient`參數。See the and methods that take a `recipient` parameter. 另請參閱屬性。Also see the property. - 訊息內容。The message content. 請參閱並採用的方法`body`參數。See the and methods that take a `body` parameter. 另請參閱屬性。Also see the property. 若要包含的電子郵件訊息的附件，請先建立附件 」 使用類別，並再將它新增至訊息，使用屬性。To include an attachment with an email message, first create the attachment by using the class, and then add it to the message by using the property. 收件者和附件的檔案類型所使用的電子郵件讀取器，根據某些收件者可能無法讀取附件。Depending on the email reader used by the recipients and the file type of the attachment, some recipients might not be able to read the attachment. 對於無法在其原始形式顯示附件的用戶端，您可以指定替代的檢視，使用屬性。For clients that cannot display the attachment in its original form, you can specify alternate views by using the property. 在.NET Framework 中，您可以使用應用程式或電腦組態檔，以指定預設為所有的主機、 連接埠和認證值物件。In .NET Framework, you can use the application or machine configuration files to specify default host, port, and credentials values for all objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ <mailSettings>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<mailSettings> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md). .NET core 不支援設定預設值。.NET Core does not support setting defaults. 因應措施，您必須設定相關的屬性上直接。As a workaround, you must set the relevant properties on directly. 若要等候要傳送到 SMTP 伺服器的電子郵件時傳送電子郵件訊息和區塊，使用其中一種同步方法。To send the email message and block while waiting for the email to be transmitted to the SMTP server, use one of the synchronous methods. 若要允許您的程式的主執行緒繼續執行時傳送電子郵件，請使用其中一個非同步方法。To allow your program's main thread to continue executing while the email is transmitted, use one of the asynchronous methods. 就會引發事件時作業完成。The event is raised when a operation completes. 若要收到此事件，您必須新增委派給。To receive this event, you must add a delegate to . 委派必須參考所處理的通知的回呼方法事件。The delegate must reference a callback method that handles notification of events. 若要取消非同步電子郵件傳輸，請使用方法。To cancel an asynchronous email transmission, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有進行中的電子郵件傳輸，而且您呼叫或是同樣地，您會收到。If there is an email transmission in progress and you call or again, you will receive an . 建立目前執行個體的連接到 SMTP 伺服器的類別可能會重複使用，如果應用程式想要將多個訊息傳送至相同的 SMTP 伺服器。The connection established by the current instance of the class to the SMTP server may be re-used if an application wishes to send multiple messages to the same SMTP server. 使用驗證或加密時，這會特別有用連接到 SMTP 伺服器。This is particularly useful when authentication or encryption are used establish a connection to the SMTP server. 驗證和建立 TLS 工作階段的程序可能會耗費資源的作業。The process of authenticating and establishing a TLS session can be expensive operations. 需要重新建立每個訊息的連線，傳送到相同的 SMTP 伺服器的數量龐大的電子郵件時對效能有重大影響。A requirement to re-establish a connection for each message when sending a large quantity of email to the same SMTP server could have a significant impact on performance. 有一些大量電子郵件應用程式傳送電子郵件狀態更新，電子報的散發套件，或電子郵件警示。There are a number of high-volume email applications that send email status updates, newsletter distributions, or email alerts. 也許多電子郵件用戶端應用程式支援離線模式，其中使用者可以撰寫許多建立 SMTP 伺服器的連接時稍後傳送的電子郵件訊息。Also many email client applications support an off-line mode where users can compose many email messages that are sent later when a connection to the SMTP server is established. 通常會將所有的 SMTP 訊息傳送至特定的 SMTP 伺服器 （網際網路服務提供者所提供），然後將轉送到其他的 SMTP 伺服器的這封電子郵件的電子郵件用戶端。It is typical for an email client to send all SMTP messages to a specific SMTP server (provided by the Internet service provider) that then forwards this email to other SMTP servers. 好讓它可以避免重新建立每個訊息至相同的伺服器連接的額外負荷 SMTP 連線集區的類別實作。The class implementation pools SMTP connections so that it can avoid the overhead of re-establishing a connection for every message to the same server. 應用程式可能會重複使用相同物件，將許多不同的電子郵件傳送到相同的 SMTP 伺服器以及許多不同的 SMTP 伺服器。An application may re-use the same object to send many different emails to the same SMTP server and to many different SMTP servers. 如此一來，沒有任何方法來判斷應用程式完成時使用物件，而且它應該會清除。As a result, there is no way to determine when an application is finished using the object and it should be cleaned up. 當 SMTP 工作階段完成並在用戶端想要終止的連接時，它必須傳送至伺服器，以表示它具有任何訊息来傳送的 QUIT 訊息。When an SMTP session is finished and the client wishes to terminate the connection, it must send a QUIT message to the server to indicate that it has no more messages to send. 這可讓伺服器釋出與從用戶端連接相關聯的資源，並處理用戶端所傳送的訊息。This allows the server to free up resources associated with the connection from the client and process the messages which were sent by the client. 類別沒有`Finalize`方法，所以應用程式必須呼叫以明確釋放資源。The class has no `Finalize` method, so an application must call to explicitly free up resources. 方法逐一查看所有已建立連接中指定的 SMTP 伺服器屬性並將 QUIT 訊息後面接著正常結束 TCP 連線。The method iterates through all established connections to the SMTP server specified in the property and sends a QUIT message followed by gracefully ending the TCP connection. 方法也會釋放所使用的 unmanaged 的資源並選擇性處置 managed 資源。The method also releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以非同步方式傳送電子郵件訊息。The following code example demonstrates sending an email message asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NclMailAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/cpp/mailasync.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclMailAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/CS/mailasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NclMailAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/vb/mailasync.vb#1)]

span.span: Specify which certificates should be used to establish the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection.

value.span: ，保存一個或多個用戶端憑證。

span.span: An , holding one or more client certificates.

value.span: 預設值是擷取自組態檔中的郵件組態屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: The default value is derived from the mail configuration attributes in a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端憑證的是，根據預設，選擇性的。不過，將伺服器設定可能需要用戶端出示有效的憑證，做為初始連線交涉的一部分。Client certificates are, by default, optional; however, the server configuration might require that the client present a valid certificate as part of the initial connection negotiation. > [!NOTE] > 架構在建立快取的 SSL 工作階段，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段，對新的要求。The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible. 嘗試將重複使用的 SSL 工作階段時，架構會使用第一個項目（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果是空的。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if is empty. ## Examples 下列的程式碼範例會建立與 SMTP 伺服器的 SSL 連線，並傳送電子郵件會使用連接。The following code example establishes an SSL connection with the SMTP server and uses the connection to send an email. span.span: An that represents the credentials to use for authentication; or if no credentials have been specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分 SMTP 伺服器要求用戶端驗證伺服器會傳送電子郵件，代替它之前。Some SMTP servers require that the client be authenticated before the server will send email on its behalf. 若要使用您的預設網路認證，您可以設定至`true`而不是設定這個屬性。To use your default network credentials, you can set the to `true` instead of setting this property. 如果屬性設定為`false,`的值的設定然後屬性將使用的認證，連接到伺服器時。If the property is set to `false,` then the value set in the property will be used for the credentials when connecting to the server. 如果屬性設定為`false`而未設定屬性，則郵件以匿名方式傳送到伺服器。If the property is set to `false` and the property has not been set, then mail is sent to the server anonymously. 認證資訊也可以使用應用程式和電腦組態檔來指定。Credentials information can also be specified using the application and machine configuration files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ <mailSettings>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<mailSettings> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md). 如果使用指定的資訊屬性，這項資訊會覆寫組態檔設定。If information is specified using the property, this information overrides the configuration file settings. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您提供認證來進行基本驗證時，它們會以純文字傳送到伺服器。If you provide credentials for basic authentication, they are sent to the server in clear text. 這可能會有安全性問題，因為可以看出，，然後其他人使用您的認證。This can present a security issue because your credentials can be seen, and then used by others. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定用來傳送電子郵件的認證。The following code example demonstrates setting the credentials used to send an email. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞方法包括：Delivery methods include: - SMTP 伺服器。An SMTP server. - 請將電子郵件移至的收取目錄中，iis，後者接著會將訊息傳遞。Moving the email into the pickup directory for IIS, which then delivers the message. - 將電子郵件移到指定的目錄稍後傳遞另一個應用程式。Moving the email to a directory specified by for later delivery by another application. 這個屬性的預設值也可以在機器中設定或應用程式組態檔。The default value for this property can also be set in a machine or application configuration file. 所做的變更屬性覆寫組態檔設定。Any changes made to the property override the configuration file settings.

span.span: Sends a QUIT message to the SMTP server, gracefully ends the TCP connection, and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立目前執行個體的連接到 SMTP 伺服器的類別可能會重複使用，如果應用程式想要將多個訊息傳送至相同的 SMTP 伺服器。The connection established by the current instance of the class to the SMTP server may be re-used if an application wishes to send multiple messages to the same SMTP server. 使用驗證或加密時，這會特別有用連接到 SMTP 伺服器。This is particularly useful when authentication or encryption are used establish a connection to the SMTP server. 驗證和建立 TLS 工作階段的程序可能會耗費資源的作業。The process of authenticating and establishing a TLS session can be expensive operations. 需要重新建立每個訊息的連線，傳送到相同的 SMTP 伺服器的數量龐大的電子郵件時對效能有重大影響。A requirement to re-establish a connection for each message when sending a large quantity of email to the same SMTP server could have a significant impact on performance. 有一些大量電子郵件應用程式傳送電子郵件狀態更新，電子報的散發套件，或電子郵件警示。There are a number of high-volume email applications that send email status updates, newsletter distributions, or email alerts. 也許多電子郵件用戶端應用程式支援離線模式，其中使用者可以撰寫許多建立 SMTP 伺服器的連接時稍後傳送的電子郵件訊息。Also many email client applications support an off-line mode where users can compose many email messages that are sent later when a connection to the SMTP server is established. 通常會將所有的 SMTP 訊息傳送至特定的 SMTP 伺服器 （網際網路服務提供者所提供），然後將轉送到其他的 SMTP 伺服器的這封電子郵件的電子郵件用戶端。It is typical for an email client to send all SMTP messages to a specific SMTP server (provided by the Internet service provider) that then forwards this email to other SMTP servers. 好讓它可以避免重新建立每個訊息至相同的伺服器連接的額外負荷 SMTP 連線集區的類別實作。The class implementation pools SMTP connections so that it can avoid the overhead of re-establishing a connection for every message to the same server. 應用程式可能會重複使用相同物件，將許多不同的電子郵件傳送到相同的 SMTP 伺服器以及許多不同的 SMTP 伺服器。An application may re-use the same object to send many different emails to the same SMTP server and to many different SMTP servers. 如此一來，沒有任何方法來判斷應用程式完成時使用物件，而且它應該會清除。As a result, there is no way to determine when an application is finished using the object and it should be cleaned up. 當 SMTP 工作階段完成並在用戶端想要終止的連接時，它必須傳送至伺服器，以表示它具有任何訊息来傳送的 QUIT 訊息。When an SMTP session is finished and the client wishes to terminate the connection, it must send a QUIT message to the server to indicate that it has no more messages to send. 這可讓伺服器釋出與從用戶端連接相關聯的資源，並處理用戶端所傳送的訊息。This allows the server to free up resources associated with the connection from the client and process the messages which were sent by the client. 方法逐一查看所有已建立的連線及傳送 QUIT 訊息，每個 SMTP 伺服器，後面依正常程序結束的 TCP 連線。The methods iterates through all established connections and send a QUIT message to each SMTP server, followed by gracefully ending the TCP connection. 這些方法也會發行所使用的 unmanaged 的資源並選擇性處置 managed 資源。These methods also release the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally dispose of the managed resources.

之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableSsl { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableSsl : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定 是否使用 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 加密連線。

span.span: Specify whether the uses Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to encrypt the connection.

value.span: 如果 使用 SSL 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the uses SSL; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定 SSL 是否用來存取指定的 SMTP 郵件伺服器。The property specifies whether SSL is used to access the specified SMTP mail server. 這個屬性的預設值也可以在機器中設定或應用程式組態檔。The default value for this property can also be set in a machine or application configuration file. 所做的變更屬性覆寫組態檔設定。Any changes made to the property override the configuration file settings. 類別只支援 SMTP 服務延伸模組保護 smtp 傳輸層安全性透過 RFC 3207 中所定義。The class only supports the SMTP Service Extension for Secure SMTP over Transport Layer Security as defined in RFC 3207. 在此模式中，SMTP 工作階段開始在未加密的通道，然後 STARTTLS 命令發出用戶端到伺服器，以切換為使用 SSL 的安全通訊。In this mode, the SMTP session begins on an unencrypted channel, then a STARTTLS command is issued by the client to the server to switch to secure communication using SSL. RFC 3207 發佈由 Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。See RFC 3207 published by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) for more information. 其他連線方法是 SSL 工作階段事先建立之前命令會傳送任何通訊協定。An alternate connection method is where an SSL session is established up front before any protocol commands are sent. 此連線方法有時稱為 SMTP/SSL，透過 SSL 或 SMTPS 和預設 SMTP 則是使用連接埠 465。This connection method is sometimes called SMTP/SSL, SMTP over SSL, or SMTPS and by default uses port 465. 目前不支援這種替代的連線方法，使用 SSL。This alternate connection method using SSL is not currently supported. 您可以使用指定建立 SSL 連線，應該使用哪一個用戶端憑證。You can use to specify which client certificates should be used to establish the SSL connection. 可讓您拒絕提供的 SMTP 伺服器的憑證。The allows you to reject the certificate provided by the SMTP server. 屬性可讓您指定要使用的 SSL 通訊協定版本。The property allows you to specify the version of the SSL protocol to use. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`，和 SMTP 郵件伺服器不會通告 STARTTLS 回應對 EHLO 命令，然後呼叫或是方法會擲回。If the property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the or methods will throw an . ## Examples 下列的程式碼範例會建立與 SMTP 伺服器的 SSL 連線，並傳送電子郵件會使用連接。The following code example establishes an SSL connection with the SMTP server and uses the connection to send an email. [!code-csharp[NclSSLMailSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSSLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自類別類別可以覆寫方法，以執行其他工作時就會發生事件。Classes that inherit from the class can override the method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 也可讓衍生的類別，來處理但不附加委派。 also allows derived classes to handle without attaching a delegate. 這是處理的慣用的技巧衍生類別中。This is the preferred technique for handling in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，好讓註冊的委派能接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性也可以設定使用建構函式應用程式或電腦組態檔。The value of the property can also be set using constructors or the application or machine configuration file. 如需使用組態檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <mailSettings>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md)。For more information about using configuration files, see [<mailSettings> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md). 如果使用這個屬性來指定資訊，這項資訊會覆寫組態檔設定。If information is specified using this property, this information overrides the configuration file settings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用主應用程式和應用程式組態檔中指定的連接埠傳送電子郵件訊息。The following code example demonstrates sending an email message by using the host and port specified in an application configuration file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會封鎖在傳送電子郵件時。This method blocks while the email is transmitted. 您可以指定逾時的值使用屬性，以確認此方法會傳回在指定的時間之後。You can specify a time-out value using the property to ensure that the method returns after a specified amount of time elapses. 呼叫此方法中前,並屬性必須設定透過組態檔設定相關的屬性，或藉由傳遞到此資訊建構函式。Before calling this method, the and properties must be set either through the configuration files by setting the relevant properties, or by passing this information into the constructor. 以非同步方式傳送的訊息時，您不能呼叫這個方法。You cannot call this method if there is a message being sent asynchronously. 如果 SMTP 主機需要認證，您必須呼叫這個方法之前設定它們。If the SMTP host requires credentials, you must set them before calling this method. 若要指定認證，請使用或屬性。To specify credentials, use the or properties. 如果您收到例外狀況，核取屬性，以找出原因作業失敗。If you receive an exception, check the property to find the reason the operation failed. 也可以包含內部例外狀況，指出作業失敗的原因。The can also contain an inner exception that indicates the reason the operation failed. 傳送電子郵件使用時多位收件者和 SMTP 伺服器接受為有效的部分收件者，以及拒絕其他可接受的收件者會傳送電子郵件，然後就會擲回 (或如果只有一個收件者會拒絕）。When sending email using to multiple recipients and the SMTP server accepts some recipients as valid and rejects others, sends email to the accepted recipients and then a is thrown (or a if only one recipient is rejected). A包含收件者已拒絕的清單。A contains a list of the recipients that were rejected. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`，和 SMTP 郵件伺服器不會通告 STARTTLS 回應對 EHLO 命令，然後呼叫或是方法會擲回。If the property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the or methods will throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法。The following code example demonstrates using this method. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已傳送電子郵件，或已取消作業時，收到通知，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the email has been sent or the operation has been canceled, add an event handler to the event. 您可以取消藉由呼叫的作業方法。You can cancel a operation by calling the method. 之後呼叫，您必須等到完成，然後再嘗試使用另一個電子郵件訊息傳送的電子郵件傳輸或。After calling , you must wait for the email transmission to complete before attempting to send another email message using or . 呼叫這個方法之前並藉由設定相關的屬性，或傳遞到此資訊必須透過組態檔設定建構函式。Before calling this method, the and must be set through the configuration files by setting the relevant properties, or by passing this information into the constructor. 如果 SMTP 主機需要認證，您必須呼叫這個方法之前設定它們。If the SMTP host requires credentials, you must set them before calling this method. 若要指定認證，請使用或屬性。To specify credentials, use the or properties. 如果您收到例外狀況，核取屬性，以找出原因作業失敗。If you receive an exception, check the property to find the reason the operation failed. 也可以包含內部例外狀況，指出作業失敗的原因。The can also contain an inner exception that indicates the reason the operation failed. 傳送電子郵件使用時給多個收件者的 SMTP 伺服器接受為有效的部分收件者，並拒絕其他項目，如果會擲回內部例外狀況。When sending email using to multiple recipients, if the SMTP server accepts some recipients as valid and rejects others, a is thrown with a for the inner exception. 如果發生這種情況，失敗時傳送電子郵件給任何收件者。If this occurs, fails to send email to any of the recipients. 您的應用程式可以藉由檢查偵測的伺服器憑證驗證錯誤屬性傳遞至委派。Your application can detect a server certificate validation error by examining the property passed into the delegate. 屬性沒有任何作用呼叫。The property does not have any effect on a call. 若要傳送郵件和區塊，它會傳送到 SMTP 伺服器時，使用其中一種方法。To send mail and block while it is transmitted to the SMTP server, use one of the methods. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`，和 SMTP 郵件伺服器不會通告 STARTTLS 回應對 EHLO 命令，然後呼叫或是方法會擲回。If the property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the or methods will throw an . ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來取消暫止作業。Use the method to cancel a pending operation. 如果沒有等候要傳送的郵件，則這個方法會釋放資源用來儲存此郵件。If there is mail waiting to be sent, this method releases resources used to store the mail. 如果沒有任何等候要傳送的郵件，這個方法任何作用。If there is no mail waiting to be sent, this method does nothing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以非同步方式傳送電子郵件訊息。The following code example demonstrates sending an email message asynchronously. 使用者已取消郵件，如果未傳送的選項。The user has the option to cancel the mail if it has not been sent. summary.span: 取得或設定服務提供者名稱 (SPN)，當使用延伸保護時會用此名稱進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the Service Provider Name (SPN) to use for authentication when using extended protection.

value.span: ，用來指定延伸保護所使用的 SPN。

span.span: A that specifies the SPN to use for extended protection.

value.span: 此 SPN 的預設值是"SMTPSVC /<主機>」 所在<主機>是 SMTP 郵件伺服器主機名稱。

span.span: The default value for this SPN is of the form "SMTPSVC/<host>" where <host> is the hostname of the SMTP mail server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性搭配整合式 Windows 驗證，應用程式使用擴充的保護時。The property is used with integrated Windows authentication when an application is using extended protection. 隨後可以提供擴充的保護，以確保認證的挑戰回應包含服務特定資訊 (SPN) 和，必要時，通道特定資訊 （通道繫結權杖或 CBT）。The can then provide extended protection to ensure that credential challenge responses contain service specific information (a SPN) and, if necessary, channel specific information (a channel binding token or CBT). 利用此資訊在認證交換中，服務就能進一步免於惡意使用可能未正確取得的認證挑戰回應的。With this information in the credential exchanges, services are able to better protect against malicious use of credential challenge responses that might have been improperly obtained. 這個屬性的預設值也可以在機器中設定或應用程式組態檔。The default value for this property can also be set in a machine or application configuration file. 所做的變更屬性覆寫組態檔設定。Any changes made to the property override the configuration file settings.

related.span: 具有延伸保護的整合式 Windows 驗證

span.span: Integrated Windows Authentication with Extended Protection

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the amount of time after which a synchronous call times out.

value.span: ，指定以毫秒為單位的逾時值。

span.span: An that specifies the time-out value in milliseconds.
The default value is 100,000 (100 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，呼叫方法區塊，直到作業完成為止。By default, calls to the method block until the operation completes. 如果您設定設為正值的屬性和作業無法在分配的時間，完成類別會擲回例外狀況。If you set the property to a positive value, and a operation cannot complete in the allotted time, the class throws an exception. 若要傳送訊息，並繼續執行應用程式執行緒中，使用方法。To send a message and continue executing in the application thread, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得和設定的逾時值。The following code example demonstrates getting and setting the time-out value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分 SMTP 伺服器需要用戶端進行驗證之前，伺服器會代替它來傳送電子郵件。Some SMTP servers require that the client be authenticated before the server sends email on its behalf. 將此屬性設定為`true`時這物件，如果要求的伺服器上，驗證使用目前登入使用者的預設認證。Set this property to `true` when this object should, if requested by the server, authenticate using the default credentials of the currently logged on user. 用戶端應用程式，這是在大部分情況下想要的行為。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 認證資訊也可以使用應用程式和電腦組態檔來指定。Credentials information can also be specified using the application and machine configuration files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ <mailSettings>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<mailSettings> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md). 如果屬性設定為`false,`的值的設定然後屬性將使用的認證，連接到伺服器時。If the property is set to `false,` then the value set in the property will be used for the credentials when connecting to the server. 如果屬性設定為`false`而未設定屬性，則郵件以匿名方式傳送到伺服器。If the property is set to `false` and the property has not been set, then mail is sent to the server anonymously. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您提供認證來進行基本驗證時，它們會以純文字傳送到伺服器。If you provide credentials for basic authentication, they are sent to the server in clear text. 這可能會有安全性問題，因為可以看出，，然後其他人使用您的認證。This can present a security issue because your credentials can be seen, and then used by others. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#2)]
